SEARCH
Package com.bcb.vetra.controllers

Class MessageController

java.lang.Object
com.bcb.vetra.controllers.MessageController
@PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") @RestController public class MessageController extends Object
Controller for messages.

This class is responsible for handling all HTTP requests related to messages.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/messages") public List<Message> getAll(Principal principal)
      Gets all message sent to or from user.
      Parameters:
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      A list of all messages for the currently logged in user.

    • get

      @GetMapping("/messages/{messageId}") public Message get(@PathVariable int messageId, Principal principal)
      Gets a message by its ID.
      Parameters:
      messageId - The ID of the message.
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      The message with the given ID.

    • getAll

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/messages/all") public List<Message> getAll()
      Gets all messages
      Returns:
      A list of all messages.

      Gets a message by its ID.
      Parameters:
      messageId - The ID of the message.
      Returns:
      The message with the given ID.

    • createForPatient

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping("/patients/{patientId}/messages") public Message createForPatient(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Message message, @PathVariable int patientId, Principal principal)
      Creates a new message attributed to a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to create.
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      The created message.

    • createForTest

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping("/patients/{patientId}/tests/{testId}/messages") public Message createForTest(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Message message, @PathVariable int patientId, @PathVariable int testId, Principal principal)
      Creates a new message attributed to a specific test.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to create.
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      testId - The ID of the test.
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      The created message.
